it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.server

Class VirtualMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.server.VirtualMapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapListener, MapView

    public class VirtualMapView
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapView, MapListener
    A virtual view is a view object that acts as an adapter between model/controller and views, translating the model objects into plain data objects usable by views. This way the view is completely separated from the model and we do not need to clone/reflect model objects into the client. Note: the VirtualGameView is also used to give information about the in-game users to the other virtual views.
